representations.typeName: {   "definitions": {},   "type": "object",   "title": "The Root Schema",   "required": [     "orderNumber",     "customer",     "orderDate",     "deliveryAddress",     "lines"   ],   "properties": {     "orderNumber": {       "$id": "#/properties/orderNumber",       "type": "string",       "title": "The Ordernumber Schema",       "default": "",       "examples": [         "ABC1234567890"       ],       "pattern": "^(.*)$"     },     "customer": {       "$id": "#/properties/customer",       "type": "string",       "title": "The Customer Schema",       "default": "",       "examples": [         "Karl Hedin"       ],       "pattern": "^(.*)$"     },     "orderDate": {       "$id": "#/properties/orderDate",       "type": "string",       "title": "The Orderdate Schema",       "default": "",       "examples": [         "2019-04-29"       ],       "pattern": "^(.*)$"     },     "deliveryAddress": {       "$id": "#/properties/deliveryAddress",       "type": "object",       "title": "The Deliveryaddress Schema",       "required": [         "name",         "line1",         "city",         "postalCode",         "countrycode"       ],       "properties": {         "name": {           "$id": "#/properties/deliveryAddress/properties/name",           "type": "string",           "title": "The Name Schema",           "default": "",           "examples": [             "Karl Hedin"           ],           "pattern": "^(.*)$"         },         "line1": {           "$id": "#/properties/deliveryAddress/properties/line1",           "type": "string",           "title": "The Line1 Schema",           "default": "",           "examples": [             "Storgatan 22"           ],           "pattern": "^(.*)$"         },         "line2": {           "$id": "#/properties/deliveryAddress/properties/line2",           "type": "string",           "title": "The Line2 Schema",           "default": "",           "examples": [             ""           ],           "pattern": "^(.*)$"         },         "city": {           "$id": "#/properties/deliveryAddress/properties/city",           "type": "string",           "title": "The City Schema",           "default": "",           "examples": [             "Gävle"           ],           "pattern": "^(.*)$"         },         "postalCode": {           "$id": "#/properties/deliveryAddress/properties/postalCode",           "type": "string",           "title": "The Postalcode Schema",           "default": "",           "examples": [             "80622"           ],           "pattern": "^(.*)$"         },         "countrycode": {           "$id": "#/properties/deliveryAddress/properties/countrycode",           "type": "string",           "title": "The Countrycode Schema",           "default": "",           "examples": [             "SE"           ],           "pattern": "^(.*)$"         }       }     },     "lines": {       "$id": "#/properties/lines",       "type": "array",       "title": "The Lines Schema",       "items": {         "$id": "#/properties/lines/items",         "type": "object",         "title": "The Items Schema",         "required": [           "lineNumber",           "productNumber",           "quantity"         ],         "properties": {           "lineNumber": {             "$id": "#/properties/lines/items/properties/lineNumber",             "type": "string",             "title": "The Linenumber Schema",             "default": "",             "examples": [               "10"             ],             "pattern": "^(.*)$"           },           "productNumber": {             "$id": "#/properties/lines/items/properties/productNumber",             "type": "string",             "title": "The Productnumber Schema",             "default": "",             "examples": [               "55588942"             ],             "pattern": "^(.*)$"           },           "quantity": {             "$id": "#/properties/lines/items/properties/quantity",             "type": "integer",             "title": "The Quantity Schema",             "default": 0,             "examples": [               2             ]           },           "comment": {             "$id": "#/properties/lines/items/properties/comment",             "type": "string",             "title": "The Comment Schema",             "default": "",             "examples": [               "Explosive, be carefull"             ],             "pattern": "^(.*)$"           }         }       }     }   } }
